Dracona:

"i shall chase him down if you wish me to, sir!" says Dracona, getting ready
for combat and converting to beast mode!.......

From: <KSLawdogg@...>

Sent: Friday, April 21, 2000 6:59 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Nemesis Enforcer:
>
> (Note to Code, Nemesis is loyal to the Alliance cause, especially Zardus,
but
> this character is responding to an attack from Wolfgang, and this
character
> doesn't take crap from anybody, almost)
>
> ::His exteremely durable wings easily taking the shots, the bat
transformed
> to his robot mode, firing off a few dozen shots at Wolfgang and Dracona
> (though the shots aren't 100% accurate or super deadly, just to drive
> Wolfgang and Dracona back)
> ::Charging down a hallway, Nemesis Enforcer transformed back to beast
mode,
> smashing through a ventilation shaft and transforming back, quickly going
> into the depths of the Alliance shift::
